full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD, DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA CIG GI 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA MANG BDAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS LA MANG YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR RGYAL PO @004B YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GAS BSKUL ZHING SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRO DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAN PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING KHAMS CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS, BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS S+HO, ,)
